name: choreographer deluxe 2019 cd-rom (inktober prompt: "mindless")
description:
I mindlessly dance all the time--going on long walks, listening to music, and even busting a move here and there makes me feel great! I literally do not care if I am bad at dancing. It's fun and feels awesome! 

So I made a game of myself in which I am a silly cartoon dancer whose movements you can control.
